info.name: finan_17_verify_to_edit_transaction
info.description:
### Testsuite: Verify to edit manual transaction

###### Testcase:

1. Login with owner account
2. Get data
    1. Account coa / Get list coa => get ~~list credit &~~ list debit account
    2. Account cash_n_bank / Get list account => get list credit
    3. Posting / Get list posting => get total posting
    4. Report / Get report cash_flow
    5. Report / Get report account
    6. Transaction / Get list transaction => get total transaction
    7. (2.f. had invoice) Invoice / Get list invoice
    8. (2.f. had invoice) Invoice / Get invoice detail
    9. (2.f. had invoice) Report / Get report account receivable paid => get data
    10. (2.f. had invoice) Report / Get report account receivable unpaid => get data
    11. (2.f. had invoice) Report / Get report account receivable customer => get data respective with invoice at 2.c.
    12. (2.f. had invoice) Report / Get report account receivable invoice => get data respective with 2.c
    13. ~~(2.f. had invoice) Home / todo / invoice overdue~~
    14. ~~(2.f. had invoice) Home / todo / uncategory tnx~~
    15. (2.f. had invoice) Home / account balance / account lifetime => get data
    16. (2.f. had invoice) Home / cash flow / cash flow period => get data
    17. (2.f. had invoice) Home / profit n loss / profit n loss period => get data
    18. (2.f. had invoice) Home / receivable account / receivable payable => get data
3. Edit manual transaction
    1. Unhappy case: null data (except txn_type > default 'out', value_at)
    2. Unhappy case: amount < 0
    3. Unhappy case: missing credit ()
    4. Unhappy case: missing debit ()
    5. Unhappy case: credit is not existed
    6. Unhappy case: debit is not existed
    7. Unhappy case: min/max characters for description
    8. Unhappy case: value_at is later current
    9. Happy case => check all data created
4. Check data
    1. Transaction / Get list transaction => have new record
    2. Transaction / Get transaction detail => data correctly
    3. Account cash_n_bank / Get list account => check respective banlance_amount
    4. Posting / get list posting => have x new posting (must double check x)
    5. Report / Get report cash_flow => update data
    6. Report / Get report account => update data
    7. (2.f. had invoice) Invoice / Get list invoice => check old invoice
    8. (2.f. had invoice) Invoice / Get invoice detail => check data
    9. (2.f. had invoice) Report / Get report account receivable paid => get data
    10. (2.f. had invoice) Report / Get report account receivable unpaid => get data
    11. (2.f. had invoice) Report / Get report account receivable customer => get data respective with invoice at 2.c.
    12. (2.f. had invoice) Report / Get report account receivable invoice => get data respective with 2.c
    13. (2.f. had invoice) Home / account balance / account lifetime => check data
    14. (2.f. had invoice) Home / cash flow / cash flow period => PENDING (missing rule from PO)
    15. (2.f. had invoice) Home / profit n loss / profit n loss period => PENDING (missing rule from PO)
    16. (2.f. had invoice) Home / receivable account / receivable payable => check data

###### Note:

- Account sẽ không có số liệu về amount, phần check balance_amount cần thực hiện ở các API về report
- credit account: all accounts in sub_group: cash_and_bank
- debit account: all accounts except sub_groups: cash_and_bank, Current Liabilities
